Package servlets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddMSG
    Servlet For adding message for HelpMe feature.
    AddReview
    Servlet For adding a review on book.
    GetAllMSGS
    Servlet for retrieving all the message from DB for the user/admin (by session).
    GetAllOwns
    Servlet for getting all the transactions from DB.
    GetAllReviews
    Servlet servlet for getting all the reviews from DB.
    GetAllUsers
    Servlet for getting all the customers info from DB (doesn't return PASSWORDS).
    GetBook
    Servlet for getting a book to read.
    GetBookInfoByName
    Servlet implementation class GetBookByName
    GetBookLikes
    Servlet getting the likers of the book.
    GetBookReview
    Servlet for getting the reviews of the book.
    GetBooksByGenre
    Servlet for getting books by genre.
    GetBooksGenre
    Servlet for getting all the genres of the books to display them as category.
    GetBooksLikedByUsername
    Servlet for getting books the customer liked.
    GetCustomer
    Servlet for getting choosen customer info.
    GetCustomerBySession
    Servlet for getting customer info by session (logged in customer).
    GetFeaturedBooksServlet
    Servlet implementation class GetFeaturedBooksServlet
    GetOwnedBooks
    Servlet for getting owned books by session (logged in customer).
    GetOwnedBooksADMIN
    Servlet for getting purchased books for choosen customer.
    GetOwnedStatus
    Servlet purchase check on book.
    GetUnreadMSGS
    Servlet for getting unread messages for customer
    LikeBook
    Servlet for liking a book.
    Login
    Servlet for log-in.
    Logout
    Servlet for log-out
    PurchaseBook
    Servlet for purchasing a book.
    ReadMSG
    Servlet for updating a message to already read state.
    RegisterServlet
    Servlet for registering.
    RemoveUser
    Servlet for removing customer
    SendReply
    Servlet for sending reply on massage.
    SetReadingSession
    Servlet for saving reading session on book.
    UnlikeBook
    Servlet for unlinking book.
    UpdateReview
    Servlet for updating a review to Approved/Declined state.
